Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory11.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Troy', 3: 'Looks like the battle here was especially brutal, even the foundation is deformed.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After confirming that there are no signs of life up ahead, Troy puts down his scope and walks out of the corner of the ruins.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Troy', 3: "Wanshi, everything checks out on my side. I'm going to head down the tilted foundation and investigate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Alright... I've positioned myself in a vantage point nearby.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Wow, that was fast.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'That just means I can kick up my feet sooner.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Troy checks Wanshi's coordinates on his panel, then looks up to see a sniper rifle nestled within a hole in the wall above. Wanshi leans up against the wall and yawns."}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "You've even set up your weapon. NOW I can count on you...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Troy leaps forward and arrives at a cluster of buildings under the deformed foundation.'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "But you noticed it too, didn't you? The marker for the file we've been looking for is flashing in the ruins.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "We'll finish our mission once I collect it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Copy that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: 'Let me check the scan... Alright, I should be able to enter from here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}

{3: 'Two collapsed stone slabs on the left and right support each other, forming a space just big enough for one person to enter and exit. Troy kneels down under the stone slabs and steps into the dark ruins in front of him.'}
{3: 'However, just as Troy wants to move on, he comes into contact with something hard.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Troy', 3: "Huh? My panel isn't showing anything on the display.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Scusa, outsiders are not permitted to enter.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Troy, get out of there!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "A strong shock interrupts Troy's conversation with Wanshi. The building ruins that Troy entered suddenly shake violently."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory311.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Rubble and steel bars collapse for the second time. Troy and debris fly out of the collapsed ruins and hit the opposite building, stirring up a cloud of smoke and dust.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A dark figure exits the collapsed ruins. The mechanical grinding of machine parts can be heard coming from his torso.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Wanshi's vision module can only detect an intricate machine and a head tightly bandaged as if out of punishment or atonement."}
{3: "But Wanshi and Troy's panels pick up nothing on the scan. The Babylonian equipment is useless in identifying the figure."}
{3: 'No Corrupted response. No Construct response. Not ever a human response. The flashing lights on their scanners indicate that the equipment is operating normally.'}
{3: 'The position where the figure stands is devoured by thick darkness, even light cannot escape. The moonlight and remaining light within the ruins does not reflect any color.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Troy', 3: "(Clears throat) This is the first time... I've seen someone this strange.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Troy', 3: "Wanshi... I'm okay. That thing... has what we need.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The dark figure inserts a chip into its chest, causing the mission icon to flash on their display panels.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Seems like we have our eyes on the same file.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Unfortunately, I cannot let you have it. I went through tremendous effort to unlock Gestalt's encrypted lock.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gear?', 3: 'Just an insignificant "gear." My job is to ensure that all operations run smoothly.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The dark figure replies and walks toward Troy who fell in the ruins. The gravel at its feet vibrates with each step like a pounding drum.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Step away from him.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi quickly rappels down as he empties his clip. Silver lights rain down on the shadow, only to be deflected in the air by blue lights.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: 'Is that a threat?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gear?', 3: "It seems that you can't simply die without pain.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Ngh... Troy, hold on.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: 'Outsiders must be purged.', 4: '1'}
